column6: 'YOU SAY YOU WANT A REVOLUTION?' PART 1 Drifting in space, the Bea Arthur has been damaged almost beyond repair by a sudden attack.  There is only enough life support for two people, so Deadpool must choose which of his teammates to release from cryo-sleep in order to save the rest.  Please, please, PLEASE don't let it be Dogpool! Parental Advisory '$2.99
